summary: Liinks link-in-bio template marketplace on Internet Computer with Motoko backend and React/Vite/Tailwind frontend; includes influencer/category template library and signup with user profile fields. Subscription/paywall gating is to be removed so templates and template content are viewable without requiring a subscription/payment.

existing_features.title: Motoko backend canister with access control (authorization mixin)
existing_features.description: Backend includes reusable authorization/access-control modules and integrates authorization mixins into the main canister.

existing_features.title: Motoko blob storage canister module
existing_features.description: Backend includes blob-storage mixin and storage implementation for handling uploaded binary assets (e.g., templates/images).

existing_features.title: Frontend app scaffold (React + Vite + Tailwind + shadcn/ui)
existing_features.description: React app configured with Tailwind and a large set of shadcn/ui components plus project ESLint rules and tooling.

existing_features.title: Internet Identity authentication hook + actor wiring
existing_features.description: Frontend includes hooks/utilities to authenticate with Internet Identity and create backend actors for canister calls.

existing_features.title: Landing page UI
existing_features.description: Landing page implemented as a dedicated route/page in the frontend.

existing_features.title: Pricing page UI
existing_features.description: Pricing page implemented as a dedicated route/page in the frontend.

existing_features.title: Signup page UI
existing_features.description: Signup page implemented as a dedicated route/page.

existing_features.title: Checkout page UI
existing_features.description: Checkout page implemented as a dedicated route/page.

existing_features.title: Template gallery, detail, and editor pages
existing_features.description: Frontend pages for browsing templates, viewing template details, and editing templates (TemplateGalleryPage, TemplateDetailPage, TemplateEditorPage).

existing_features.description: Frontend includes UploadTemplatePage and supporting storage client utilities for uploading and managing assets.

existing_features.description: Reusable UI components enabling editing of links and social handles and uploading a payment QR image, plus supporting template/brand UI components.

existing_features.description: Included build-template with Dockerfile, scripts (prune/resize images), canister YAMLs, workspace configs, and deployment scripts for ICP.

existing_features.description: Includes an initial set of premium-quality, published templates organized by the existing category list so the Template Gallery is populated for new users after signup.

existing_features.title: Subscription/paywall gating for Premium and Pro tiers
existing_features.description: Implements Premium (₹199) and Pro (₹499) subscription state and gates actions like template copying/customization and Pro-only template uploads based on active subscription.

existing_features.title: INR checkout flow with Razorpay/UPI details and QR upload/display
existing_features.description: Checkout supports INR pricing and displays receiver payment details (e.g., UPI ID) and UPI QR, enabling users to complete the payment confirmation flow for subscription activation.

existing_features.title: Backend-configurable receiver payment details surfaced in Checkout
existing_features.description: Receiver payment details (at minimum receiver UPI ID) are configurable in the backend and fetched/displayed in the frontend Checkout instead of being hardcoded.

existing_features.title: Expanded signup form fields (first/last name, phone, email)
existing_features.description: Signup UX collects first name, last name, phone number, and email as part of registration.

existing_features.title: In-app upgrade CTAs from template browsing to Pricing/Checkout
existing_features.description: Non-subscribed users are prompted within template browsing (gallery/detail) to upgrade, with clear calls-to-action navigating to Pricing and then Checkout.

existing_features.title: End-to-end subscription activation with live UI state updates
existing_features.description: After payment confirmation on Checkout, subscription state updates in-app and gated actions become available without requiring manual page refresh.

existing_features.title: Public shared bio page (shareable link-in-bio view)
existing_features.description: Frontend includes a dedicated SharedBioPage route to render a public, shareable link-in-bio view for a template/profile without requiring the editor flow.

existing_features.title: Make template browsing and viewing work for all users (including guests and unregistered users) so the Template Gallery and Template Detail pages always show template content.
Remove subscription/paywall gating from the template flow so users are not blocked from copying/customizing templates due to subscription status.

new_feature_requests.summary: Remove subscription/paywall gating so users can view and see template content without a subscription
Remove subscription enforcement from backend operations involved in customizing templates so saving a bio page does not require an active subscription.
Make template listing endpoints publicly accessible (no registration/role requirement) so template content can be fetched from the backend without requiring a registered user permission.

architectural_notes: Backend is implemented in Motoko and composes reusable modules for authorization (access control) and blob storage.
Frontend is a React + Vite app using TailwindCSS and shadcn/ui component library.
Authentication integrates Internet Identity via frontend hooks and actor creation utilities.
Project includes an ICP deployment/build template with canister configuration, scripts, and workspace tooling.
Payments must support Indian Rupees pricing tiers (₹199 Premium, ₹499 Pro) and integrate Razorpay; include UPI receiver ID and QR upload UI for payments.
Frontend introduces consolidated query/hooks layer to fetch subscription/payment configuration and keep subscription state in sync post-checkout.
Backend exposes/configures receiver payment details (e.g., UPI ID) for consumption by Checkout UI.
Upgraded Motoko authorization and blob-storage components to v4.0.0 (component refresh across backend modules).
Refreshed/expanded ICP React build-template workspace and tooling (component:core-infrastructure v1.0.2; build-template-react v1.0.0; shadcn-ui v1.0.0).
Project includes GitHub export tooling/integration for ICP CLI workflows (component:github-export-icp-cli v1.0.0).
known_issues: Users currently cannot view/see any template content (template gallery/detail appears blocked/empty), likely due to subscription gating or access checks.
